extendedInfo.description: The wait is over! One of the most popular ninja-themed social games isnow available on Android!Since its online debut in 2009, this top reviewed social RPG with itsdazzling graphics and sensational gameplay had been enticing thehidden ninjas in the hearts of over 35 million players worldwide.Join the battle now and become the greatest ninja of them all!Features:- Customize your ninja with weapons, outfits and even Ninjutsu!- Tons of missions that keep you busy for hours!- Team up with three ninja- Five Ninjutsu elements of your choice- Build a unique team of ninja- Blacksmith and Weapon upgrade- Hunting House- Achievements- Exciting in-game events- Regular updates- Pet System- Chunin Exam- Level 41-60 ContentsFuture Update:- Clan Battle- Player vs. Player Battle- And MUCH MORE!StoryThe world of the Shinobi is now at the brink of chaos and destructionafter a siege by a mysterious evil force. At these desperate times, ahero must rise to embark on a treacherous journey to defeat the evilforces and protect the world from oblivion. Born from the ashes of thelast Great War, a young ninjas looks out to this chaotic world withone ambitionâ¦to become the Ninja of all ninjas and restore peace andorder to this world.

reviews.title: NICE UPDATE!
reviews.comment: This is a great update! Please add more level, equipment and item i will give you 5 stars, keep this great work guys!
reviews.author: sell limtie

reviews.title: Great job!
reviews.comment: Looks like you guys are reading our reviews afterall. It will be great if you put an event twice or once a month so that lvl 60 players have something to do. Or add talents and bosses in the hunting place.
reviews.author: Winston Lazarte

reviews.title: You must fix it
reviews.comment: It was the best game but  please make it better the this. you must put the event twist or once of month, put another pet , gear,  another hunting bosses and much more. You mus make it completly perfect. I give 3 rate for this.
reviews.author: naz syima

reviews.title: Fire badge for pet event
reviews.comment: Where can I get fire badge to get the pet? It says login to claim free fire badge. Where should I login? And also very slow loading time.
reviews.author: Karlo Dimaano

reviews.title: Black screen
reviews.comment: Every time I start the app it says checking then it goes to a black screen and at that point it will either stay there or force close.
reviews.author: Jak Nitro

reviews.title: Good but not good enough
reviews.comment: I have played this a lot and I am in level 52 and I want to ask you to please put the pvp update and also more justu because there is a pvp update on apple thanks and please reply at zawaar.shah@gmail.com
reviews.author: Zawaar Shah

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Can you make sure we can play online fight with other people

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Its okay but no events no arena which is a main thing and ofcourse d main no talent getting bored
reviews.author: Rahul Pathak

reviews.title: Good Game, but
reviews.comment: Please add more feature I\'ll give 5 stars If It updates
reviews.author: Syamil Muharror

reviews.title: Very good game
reviews.comment: I used to play this in the Ipod ios when it first came out and i gotta say this version is better and easier than the desktop version. Hopefully soon they come out with the talents features for your ninja like in the desktop version. Can\'t wait for that.
reviews.author: Christian Devitt

reviews.title: Needs immediate effect
reviews.comment: I can\'t train my ninjas.. the moment I click academy it says \"unexpectedly ninja saga has stopped working\", you gotta fix this problem.. I waited patiently for it to be downloaded
reviews.author: Ningma Makan

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: This game is so good I play in facebook

reviews.title: Black screen
reviews.comment: when I installed it the game  then download the extra files then when it was done  it just went to a black screen
reviews.author: brent stockton

reviews.title: One move
reviews.comment: Whenever I get critical on the group heal move it force closes. So annoying.
reviews.author: Richie Aflleje

reviews.title: Super bad
reviews.comment: After i downloaded the game,i opened the game but it was stuck on a page which keep saying checking..... I tried downloading again but didnt work
reviews.author: Muhammad Haziq

reviews.title: For the next update
reviews.comment: I love this game I play it already in iphone but now i have a samsung galaxy tab 2 7 inch the graphics is not good in this please fix it like changing the screen resolution. I love this, so make the update now or copy the things in ios ninja saga... Thank you. I suggest build a new ninja saga make it hd for the tablet user like me.
reviews.author: Reymark Ilagan

reviews.title: Waiting for ios quality
reviews.comment: I played the ios version and it\'s amazing. I want the Android version to be just as good. We need clan battles, to be able to see our ninja and pets on the field, and up to level 80 content. ios players get pets immediately we have to work for ours. We need more special events also. They have a ton and are even up to season 16 clan battle. I will wait patiently because I know you guys will follow through eventually. It\'s still a great game we just need more. I already hit the 60 cap.
reviews.author: Isaac Villa

reviews.title: Improvements for the NEXT UPDATE
reviews.comment: Ninja Saga Creator, I hope this is the NEXT UPDATES  - Buy 3rd Character in 100 Tokens & each ninja have Elements - Pet shop ( Pet Fusion, Gacha & Album ) - New characters, pets, weapons, gears, missions & bosses - Jounin Exam,( Lvl 60 - 80 ) New skills, Rewards & Talent Skills - Update New Special Events ( Every Month ) - Tensai Special Jounin Exam (Lvl 80 - 100) New skills, Reward  Talent Skills - Unlock Clan War, Arena & PvP Battle Battle in Online Sources not in via BLUE TOOTH game.  That\'s all !!! I Hope Ninja Saga Creator you will do this as soon as possible for the better performance and for downloading more features. I hope that you will follow. were waiting to UPDATE the FULL VERSION OF THIS GAME EVER. I LOVE NINJA SAGA GAME FOREVER.. SUPPORT ME GUYS>>
reviews.author: Russell Troy Nacorda

reviews.title: Its awesome
reviews.comment: Its very. Good ..
